function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ventilation domain scoring high in energy efficiency, maintenance, and comfort, increasing air circulation and potential disease transmission","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased air circulation","Mitigation":"Implement air filtration systems and regular cleaning of ventilation systems to reduce the spread of airborne diseases","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C germicidal lamps, regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Low scoring in flexibility and storage, impacting the ability to adapt spaces for disease prevention measures","Impact":"Inability to adapt spaces for disease prevention measures can increase the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement modular and flexible storage solutions, reconfigure spaces to accommodate disease prevention measures","Technologies":"Modular storage units, flexible partitioning systems, adaptive furniture","People":"Building occupants, visitors, facilities management","Owner":"Facilities management, building operators"},{"Description":"High scores for lighting and electricity domains, impacting energy efficiency and potential to reduce disease transmission","Impact":"Inefficient energy use and poor lighting can impact indoor air quality and increase the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient lighting systems, optimize electricity usage, and incorporate natural ventilation where possible","Technologies":"LED lighting, occupancy sensors, natural ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, facilities management","Owner":"Building managers, facilities management"}]}
